title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When trying to use new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in a table filter, an error message is displayed.
OB: The error message 'There are error(s) in Table: table8Error0: data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s))detail: An error happened in data type conversion. Can not convert it to Date. Can not convert it to Date.' is displayed on the report page.
EB: The table filter should work without errors. When using new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in the filter, there should be no error message displayed.
SR:
1. Open the report page. 
2. Apply a table filter using the value new Date('3/2/2005'). 
3. Save the filter and preview the report. 
4. Verify that the filter works correctly without any error messages.
